name: ITP - C1603A - Waikare Gorge Descent - Basecourse Construction

name: Detail - All previous Activities completed & signed off before Placing base course
Inspection / Test Method submission, visual inspection, testing, measure, review - Document Review
Detail - Cross Fall and levels to tie in with pre-existing carriageway
Inspection / Test Method submission, visual inspection, testing, measure, review - Visual
Conformance Criteria - Set out and levels agreed with CPS Engineer on site
Detail - All aggregate loads coming to site to have delivery dockets checked to ensure material is coming from the correct stockpile.
Frequency - During construction, traceability of all materials delivered to site
Inspection / Test Method submission, visual inspection, testing, measure, review - Visual check, document review
Conformance Criteria - Conforms to TNZ M/4 specification
Frequency - 1 sample/10,000M3 or 1 per source stockpile.
Inspection / Test Method submission, visual inspection, testing, measure, review - PSD, Atterberg Limits, MDD, OMC and CBR
Conformance Criteria - Comply with TNZ M/4 specification
Inspection / Test Method submission, visual inspection, testing, measure, review - NDM Lab Testing
Conformance Criteria - Avg. >= 98% MDD and Min. >= 95% MDD
Detail - Cross fall check. Surface shape check.
Inspection / Test Method submission, visual inspection, testing, measure, review - Visual check & Measurement
Conformance Criteria - No point of the surface shall vary more than 10mm over a 3m long straight edge
Inspection / Test Method submission, visual inspection, testing, measure, review - Visual inspection by CPS Engineer after site sweeping
Conformance Criteria - The large and small aggregates are held in place and the matrix does not displace under normal trafficking or sweeping

name: Detail - Seal Design to be submitted by Contractor for review and approval by CPS

Conformance Criteria - Approval by CPS Engineer prior to activities commencing on site

Inspection / Test Method submission, visual inspection, testing, measure, review - Document Review

Detail - Mark out the extent of the seal if not working to a kerb line. Square off edges to tie-in to existing pavement if encroachment is into wheel path.

Conformance Criteria - Spray paint edge of seal lines
Detail - Determine spraying runs start/stop locations

Conformance Criteria - Mark out on site
Detail - 1st or 2nd Coat Chip seal - Bitumen (Design dependent on season)
Frequency - 1 test per bulk shipment or grade
Inspection / Test Method submission, visual inspection, testing, measure, review - IANZ Lab Testing
Detail - Sealing Chip Source Properties as per seal design
Inspection / Test Method submission, visual inspection, testing, measure, review - IANZ Lab testing NZTA M/6
Inspection / Test Method submission, visual inspection, testing, measure, review - Site Measurements
Detail - Record Bitumen temperature at time of spraying
Inspection / Test Method submission, visual inspection, testing, measure, review - Temperature of load using sprayer calibrated temperature probe.
Conformance Criteria - Temp. appropriate to base emulsion and +/-5 degrees. IANZ calibrated probe
Detail - Bitumen application rate each spray run to be determined on the day dependent on conditions by sealing supervisor
Inspection / Test Method submission, visual inspection, testing, measure, review - Measure by calibrated dipstick reading
Conformance Criteria - Current E/2 Certificate, +/- 4% per Spray Run
Detail - Details of roller type, etc please
Frequency - After completion of sealing, rolling. 24 hour trafficking post rolling

Detail - CPS Engineer to carry out inspection and check the bitumen is completely bonded to the sealing chips. (No stripping)
Frequency - At Completion of Chip sealing, for each site

Detail - Ensure all NCRs are closed and included within QA file, Lab Testing Test Reports to be included in QA File

Detail - A complete set of subcontractors QA to be included in QA file

Conformance Criteria - Check all subcontractor QA records
ITP - C3001 - Mangaturanga Bridge Repair - Bridge Deck Repair
template name: ITP - C3001 - Mangaturanga Bridge Repair - Bridge Deck Repair

name: Detail - Dimensions of concrete breakout on bridge deck must be agreed with the CPS Engineer
Inspection / Test Method submission, visual inspection, testing, measure, review - Visual Inspection
Conformance Criteria - Dimensions at top deck and deck soffit agreed upon
Detail - Contractor must provide a list of all proposed repair construction materials with any technical data sheets available for each material for CPS Engineer approval.
Inspection / Test Method submission, visual inspection, testing, measure, review - Submission
Conformance Criteria - List of all materials and technical data sheets
Detail - CPS Engineer to inspect the areas broken out to inspect surface edge preparation
Inspection / Test Method submission, visual inspection, testing, measure, review - Visual Inspection
Conformance Criteria - 45° taper cut on all 4 edges, no damage to existing reinforcement and shear cleat.
Detail - Exposed and accessible (top and bottom) reinforcing steel must be power tool cleaned to SSPC SP3 standard. Other areas cleaned to SSPC SP2 standard
Inspection / Test Method submission, visual inspection, testing, measure, review - Visual Inspection
Conformance Criteria - SSPC SP3 and SP2 standard.
Detail - HD10 longitudinal bars to comply to design
Inspection / Test Method submission, visual inspection, testing, measure, review - Visual Inspection
Conformance Criteria - Ensure all new and existing reinforcement bars are coated with a cement-based polymer modified coating material containing silica fume. Ensure all surfaces are fully coated
Inspection / Test Method submission, visual inspection, testing, measure, review - Visual Inspection
Conformance Criteria - HD10 hooked straight bars, crs 150mm, to form closed loop with hooked bent bar, embedded minimum 150mm, distance between 45° breakout face to be between 20-30mm
Inspection / Test Method submission, visual inspection, testing, measure, review - Visual Inspection
Conformance Criteria - HD10 hooked bent bars, crs 150mm, to form closed loop with hooked straight bar, embedded minimum 150mm with chemset, distance between 45° breakout face to be between 20-30mm
Detail - CPS Engineer to inspect placement of reinforcing steel after it is fixed in position
Inspection / Test Method submission, visual inspection, testing, measure, review - Visual Inspection
Conformance Criteria - Hooked bars tied with 2mm wire as per construction drawings
Records - CS-4040 Concrete Inspection Record & Photos
Detail - CPS Engineer to inspect formwork before casting
Inspection / Test Method submission, visual inspection, testing, measure, review - Visual Inspection

Conformance Criteria - Forms must have sufficient rigidity and strength to prevent distortion due to pressure from the concrete. Formwork to remain in place until concrete reaches a compressive strength of 30MPa
Records - CS-4040 Concrete Inspection Record & Photos
Inspection / Test Method submission, visual inspection, testing, measure, review - Visual Inspection
Conformance Criteria - Ensure exposed concrete edges are free from dust and loose particles
Detail - Site Engineer to witness casting of concrete deck repair
Inspection / Test Method submission, visual inspection, testing, measure, review - Visual Inspection
Conformance Criteria - All concrete used in deck repair must be in compliance with T-CES 101. Surface finish in accordance with NZS 3114. Deck top surface - U3. Exposed soffit of deck - F5.
Detail - Contractor to provide minimum of 9 concrete cubes for laboratory material compressive testing
Inspection / Test Method submission, visual inspection, testing, measure, review - Lab Testing
Conformance Criteria - Minimum compressive strength of:
– Patchroc C (Fosroc) or equivalent should be used.
– All concrete supplied shall comply with NZS 3109
Inspection / Test Method submission, visual inspection, testing, measure, review - Submission
Conformance Criteria - Contractor to provide details of the proposed measures intended to protect the concrete during curing
Detail - Prior to resurfacing, CPS Engineer to inspect the newly cast deck repair and make the decision whether crack injection is required
Inspection / Test Method submission, visual inspection, testing, measure, review - Visual Inspection
Conformance Criteria - Crack injection required if crack between newly cast concrete and existing deck exceeds 0.3mm. Sealant strip will be applied instead of crack injection
Records - Photos prior and after sealant
Detail - Road surfacing reinstated to be consistent with rest of deck surfacing (Grade 3/5 racked in Chipseal). Contractor to provide methodology for resurfacing
Inspection / Test Method submission, visual inspection, testing, measure, review - Submission
Detail - Upon completion of works, Site Engineer to inspect works to confirm it is completed to required standard for sign off
Inspection / Test Method submission, visual inspection, testing, measure, review - Visual Inspection
Conformance Criteria - Signatures from Site and CPS Engineers
Detail - Red line mark up drawings to be reviewed and accepted. All NCRs and RFIs are closed and included with Handover QA file.
Inspection / Test Method submission, visual inspection, testing, measure, review - Document Review
Conformance Criteria - Ensure all QA is uploaded into ConQA / Procore
